title: Outdoor Spa, Bike and Ski Repair Shop, Recessed Light Fixtures
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 93', 'OR Text', '93', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text us.', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 731 Sq.', 'Ft.', "Offering enhanced studio, one-bedroom, and two-bedroom apartment homes, West 38 is one of Wheat Ridge's most premier apartment communities.", "West 38 is more than just a place to rest your head, it's a community built to provide you with the lifestyle and friends you yearn for.", "At West 38 you'll enjoy a new level of sophistication, top-of-the-line amenities, and incredible views of the Rocky Mountains.", 'It is nestled right between the foothills and downtown Denver, just around the corner from Edgewater, Berkeley, and West Highlands.', 'Your New Home Awaits at West 38.', 'Features:', 'Custom Tile Backsplashes, Vaulted Ceilings, Gooseneck Faucets, Floor to Ceiling Windows*, Quartz Countertops, Tiled Showers and Tub Surrounds, Full-Size, Stainless Steel, Whirlpool Appliances, Designer Cabinetry, Enhanced Window and Interfloor Soundproofing, LVT Wide Plank Wood Flooring, Under Cabinet LED Lighting, Electronic Unit Entry Access, Pendant Lighting, Deep Soaker Bathtubs*, Recessed Light Fixtures, LED Lighting - Saving You Money on Utilities, Nest Thermostats for Individually Controlled Heat/Air Conditioning, Built-In Desks*, Large Private Balconies*, Views of Mountains, Lakeside and Downtown Denver*, Spacious Walk-In Closets, In-Home Washer and Dryer, Carpeted Bedrooms', '* Only available in select apartments', 'Community Amenities:', 'Additional Storage Lockers Available, Ground Floor Retail and Restaurants, Controlled Access Entry, Outdoor Spa, Gated & Covered Structured Parking, Breathtaking Views*, Pool Cabana With Grilling Stations, Bike Storage Room, Green Building - National Green Building Standard - Silver Certification, Conference Room and Co-Working Stations, Bike and Ski Repair Shop, Expansive Clubhouse, 4th Floor Indoor & Outdoor Clubroom With Grilling Station, Pet Spa, 24- Hour Fitness Center and Yoga Studio Room, Resort-Style Swimming Pool, Electric Vehicle Charging Stations, Outdoor Lounge With Fireplace, Package Delivery/Concierge System', 'Pet Policy', 'Pit Bulls, Akitas, Dobermans, and Rottweilers are restricted.', 'Visit This Website to See More:', '<URL>', 'Zxi9iQyHlA']
